channel.title: palabras más, palabras menos
channel.description: Recent content on palabras más, palabras menos

item.title: About
item.description: This blog is an experiment on using literate programming to explore Natural Language Processing and Data Science topics. I’m César de Pablo (zdepablo) and I work as a data scientist at BBVA Data & Analytics. Before that I worked at Meaningcloud and Opinator as a developer and sometimes even went a step further ;) . Even before that, I had an academic life as researcher in Natural Language Processing at UC3M Advanced Datbases Group
